product_name: CamelBak All Clear Water Purifier Bottle
long_description: The CamelBak All ClearTM water purifier bottle uses UV light to effectively neutralize viruses, bacteria and protozoa so you can enjoy safe drinking water while backpacking and traveling.
short_description: The CamelBak All ClearTM water purifier bottle uses UV light to effectively neutralize viruses, bacteria and protozoa so you can enjoy safe drinking water while backpacking and traveling.
